meanings.definition: One of the two branches of the biramous appendages of crustaceans
meanings.sent1: The endopods help the crustacean move around.
meanings.sent2: Crustaceans use their endopods for swimming and crawling.
meanings.sent3: The endopods of the crab waved hello to the fish.
meanings.sent4: The endopods were like tiny oars propelling the shrimp forward.
meanings.sent5: Watching the endopods in action was like witnessing a synchronized dance.

meanings.definition: The inner branch of the biramous appendages of crustaceans
meanings.sent1: Tiny creatures hide between the endopods of the lobster.
meanings.sent2: The inner endopods of the crab are delicate and intricate.
meanings.sent3: The hermit crab decorated its endopods with colorful shells.
meanings.sent4: The endopods, like secret tunnels, led the shrimp to safety.
meanings.sent5: The inner endopods were the lobster's hidden treasure.
